sentences.en: But woodblock printing isn't something to be learned in a short time.
sentences.cn: 只不过,刻版可不是一时半会儿就能学会的.

sentences.en: Conclusion, the Chinese origin and development of woodblock printing are all related to Buddhism.
sentences.cn: 结论, 中国雕版印刷的起源和发展都与佛教有关.

sentences.en: Han Jia, isn't it woodblock printing?
sentences.cn: 韩佳, 这不是雕版印刷 吗 ?

sentences.en: I'd be happy to show you my collection of woodblock prints any time.
sentences.cn: 我乐意随时给你看我收集的木版画.

sentences.en: Identified until the first kind is the 868 woodblock prints of the " Diamond Sutra. "
sentences.cn: 以前一直认定最早的雕版印刷品实物是868年的《金刚经 》.

sentences.en: Most of the woodblock prints of the Northeast are colored woodcuts.
sentences.cn: 北大荒版画基本上是套色木刻.

sentences.en: There're sculptures and woodblock prints in the exhibition.
These are all woodblock prints , like the originals.
sentences.cn: 这些都是木版画,就是取书名中的这个含义.

sentences.en: Traditional Chinese woodblock printing was first engraved or overlaid on wood and then printed on paper.
sentences.cn: 传统中国版画,是通过刻版或制版印刷而得.

sentences.en: Woodblock Print - authors have summed up the goods in the form of several compositions.
sentences.cn: 作者亦归纳了雕版捺印品的几种构图形式.

sentences.en: Woodblock printing developed, is bound to lead flourishing book industry.
sentences.cn: 雕版印刷的发达, 必然带动书业的兴盛.

trans.tran_en: a piece of wood with a shape cut on it, used for printing
